name: Spoiled Milk
description:
A racing-shooting game where you are tasked to deliver milk in a zombie apocalypse, but beware the zombies want your milk.

Created by a impromptu team of three, Ferdinando Spagnolo, Unity and CG generalist, Matteo Antoniella, 3d modeller and Sculpter and Oscar Domingo as game developer.

Hope you guys will enjoy!
